Class ListFolderMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • messages.Message
      • messages.ListFolderMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ListFolderMessage
extends Message
    Version:
    1.0 This class represents the message to list folders and folders' hierarchy associated with a client
    Author:
    Clash of Devs
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • ListFolderMessage

        public ListFolderMessage(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         java.lang.String command,
                         java.lang.String pathname,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> file,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> hierarchy)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor for a List Folder message.
        Parameters:
        username - Message's username.
        password - Password of message's user.
        command - Command to send to the server.
        pathname - Pathname of the folder.
        file - File contains all folders bellow pathname.
        hierarchy - Number that identifies relative position on the tree.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws exception on error.
